tool_description: Records and maintains a complete audit trail of all actions performed on a support ticket throughout its lifecycle.

ticket_id.description: Unique identifier for the support ticket

action_type.description: Type of action: created, status_changed, assigned, escalated, commented, resolved, closed

performed_by.description: ID of the user who performed the action

action_details.description: Detailed description of the action performed

previous_value.description: Previous value before the change (if applicable)

new_value.description: New value after the change (if applicable)

error_messages: Invalid ticket ID: The specified ticket does not exist in the system.
Invalid action type: Use one of [created, status_changed, assigned, escalated, commented, resolved, closed].
Invalid user ID: The performed_by user ID is not valid or does not exist.
History entry failed: Unable to record history entry due to database constraints.
usage: Provide ticket_id, action_type, and performed_by to record an action. Include action_details, previous_value, and new_value for comprehensive audit trails.

history_id.description: Unique identifier for this history entry

recorded_successfully.description: Whether the history entry was recorded successfully

timestamp.description: When the history entry was recorded

entry_sequence.description: Sequence number of this entry in the ticket's history
